page.title: 01INTRODUCTION TO SLEAFORD
page.content: SLEAFORD IS A SMALL MARKET TOWN. IT HAS A POPULATION OF ABOUT 10,000 PEOPLE.IN SLEAFORD THERE ARE SHOPS,A RAILWAY STATION,LIBRARY,CINEMA,SQUASH CLUB,GROUP MEDICAL PRACTICE AND MANY OTHER FACILITIES.OVER THE PAST 10 YEARS SLEAFORD HAS SEEN SOME CHANGES IN ITS BUILDINGS e.g.A NEW SWIMMING POOL AND SEVERAL HOUSING ESTATES WHICH HAVE BROUGHT JOBS TO THE AREA.SLEAFORD IS IDEALLY LOCATED FOR COMMUTING TO LOCAL INDUSTRIAL AREAS e.g.LINCOLN OR GRANTHAM.SLEAFORD ALSO SERVES MANY LOCAL VILLAGES BY PROVIDING THEM WITH SCHOOLS AND SHOPS AS WELL AS 5 BANKS 6 BUILDING SOCIETES AND A HEAD POST OFFICE. A NUMBER OF PEOPLE ARE EMPLOYED IN THE TOWN BY INTREFLORA,SHARPES SEEDS AND PADLEYS.THERE IS ALSO A LARGE RAF CAMP NEARBY CALLED CRANWELL. {BY ANDREW GREEN (AGE 14)}
